so_37418740: COUNTER="0"
fileName="spreadsheet.csv"
for file in $(find folder/ -name "$fileName" -type f -printf '%P\n'); 
do
  sourcePath=$(dirname $(readlink -f "$file")) 
  cp -v $sourcePath/$fileName /new/location/"$fileName$COUNTER" 
  COUNTER=$((COUNTER+1)) 
done
